mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.f_sobillid AS "sobillId", a.f_itemid AS "itemId", a.f_unit AS "unit", a.f_auxpropid AS "auxpropId", a.f_batchno AS "batchno", a.f_price AS "price", a.f_auxqty AS "auxqty", a.f_amount AS "amount", a.f_rowid AS "rowId", a.f_synstatus AS "synStatus", a.f_syntime AS "synTime", a.f_custid AS "custId", a.f_deptid AS "deptId", a.f_emplid AS "emplId"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ic_sobillentry( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, f_sobillid, f_itemid, f_unit, f_auxpropid, f_batchno, f_price, f_auxqty, f_amount, f_rowid, f_synstatus, f_syntime, f_custid, f_deptid, f_emplid ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{sobillId}, #{itemId}, #{unit}, #{auxpropId}, #{batchno}, #{price}, #{auxqty}, #{amount}, #{rowId}, #{synStatus}, #{synTime}, #{custId}, #{deptId}, #{emplId} )
